subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As the new Mets manager tries to remove the interim tag that he was given after replacing Willie Randolph, his ability to succeed figures to hinge in large part on how he manages José Reyes.
snippet: As the new Mets manager tries to remove the interim tag that he was given after replacing Willie Randolph, his ability to succeed figures to hinge in large part on how he manages José Reyes.
